productDescription: Electronic control unit for automotive applications
comment: PCF with GHG Protocol uncertainty assessment methodology

pcf.boundaryProcessesDescription: Cradle-to-gate including semiconductor manufacturing, assembly, and testing

uncertaintyAssessment.description: Tier 2 uncertainty assessment following GHG Protocol guidelines. Activity data uncertainty: ±5% (high confidence), Emission factors uncertainty: ±25% (medium confidence). Combined uncertainty using error propagation: ±26% at 95% confidence level.
